personal_info.name: Saksham Sangal
personal_info.address: HN-153, Adarsh colony, Muzaffarnagar, Pin:251001, Uttar Pradesh

summary: Analyst at Deloitte USI for 10+ months. Former java developer and project engineer  at Decimal Technology(7 months) and Wipro (1+ year) respectively. Major interest in competitive programming in java, data structure & algorithm, backend development. Worked on many major and minor projects for competitions, trainings, and for self-learning.
award: Spot award for excellence in work

grad.campus: Meerut Institute of Engineering and Technology [MIET]

comp.name: Deloitte USI
comp.work: Using lxml python library, created script that extract all xpath of xml. Created a flask application that create JSON which can result into doc file using Jijna2 and DocxTemplate (https://github.com/sakshamsangal/dmt). Also created a script that split large XML into chunks of XML.

comp.name: Decimal Technology
comp.work: Consumed and developed REST API, Saved the response into MySQL database using hibernate and java spring boot. Also involved in deployment of jar and angular build on UAT and prod server. Integrated tickets from service now and internal ticket mgt. system. Created REST API for the project (add, view, view-all, update API etc.). using java spring boot.

comp.name: Wipro Limited
comp.work: I was responsible for adding new feature to existing spring boot application and also involved in solving technical tickets through service-now portal.
